title: Export Project
expProjDescription: Export the entire project to a .bsp file
selDropLbl: Select a project to export, from the dropdown
customLocationForBSP: Select a location where you want to save the exported .bsp file

help.title: Export Project
help.body:
Description
Exporting the project will create a .bsp (zipped file) from the project folder.

The .bsp project file can be shared with others and they can use 'File -> Import Project' dialog to import the .bsp file.
